name: Perception
description: Your Wisdom (Perception) check lets you spot, hear, or otherwise detect the presence of something. It measures your general awareness of your surroundings and the keenness of your senses. A Perception check is used for noticing things in the environment rather than deducing conclusions from evidence (which is Investigation).
typicalUses: Detect a hidden creature (contested vs Stealth)
Notice a sound or faint noise
Spot a concealed trap or hidden door
